actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to encourage contributions of computer equipment to elementary and secondary schools.

summary.text: Computer Equipment Contribution Act of 1983 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow an increased charitable contribution deduction for corporations that donate computers to primary and secondary schools. Requires that donations be made under a written plan which provides that 75 percent of such equipment will go to low or middle income schools.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to encourage contributions of computer equipment to elementary and secondary schools.
